column5: We head to Athabasca the 14th of June can't get here soon enough.this is our third year and the fishing is hard to beat usually get a laker over 30 lbs and a Pike over 20 lbs each year. Am hoping to get a pike over 50 inches this year, not setting my sights too high , I will be pleased if I pass the 23 pound mark I set for myself last year. Will post results when we get back good fishing to all,
